definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Yin2 hang2 Gong1 hui4

sentences.english: My mother is one of the Methodists.
sentences.chinese: 我母親是衛理公會派教徒之一。

sentences.english: Here you should slide the screen area bar to the left.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，您應該幻燈片屏幕面積大律師公會到左邊。

sentences.english: The routine proceeding organ of Guangxi Lawyers Association is the chairmen's meeting.
sentences.chinese: 廣西律師協會日常的議事機構是會長辦公會。

sentences.english: SO you're part of the mining guild then?
sentences.chinese: 那你們是礦冶公會的一員？

sentences.english: For the first time a woman is presiding bishop of Episcopal Church.
sentences.chinese: 女性第一次成爲美國聖公會總主教的主教。

sentences.english: The Sanhedrin the law makers of the day.
sentences.chinese: 在當時，立法是公會的職責。

sentences.english: The idea for the festival came from the Taipei Bakery Association.
sentences.chinese: 舉辦鳳梨酥節的構想來自臺北市糕餅公會。

sentences.english: CKCMC is located in the State of Perak Manjung County.
sentences.chinese: 莫珍歪衛理公會是位於在霹靂州的曼隆縣。

sentences.english: Constcontra -ne Tin. nosso cnosled Boss Long. Founder and owner of Drefeel.
sentences.chinese: 龍雲天，又稱龍老闆，空想公會的創辦人和具有者。

sentences.english: Could you actually marry a Methodist?
sentences.chinese: 你能和衛理公會教徒結婚嗎？

sentences.english: The meeting hall of a guild.
sentences.chinese: 那你們是礦冶公會的一員？

sentences.english: Why did this miracle speed up the plans of the Sanhedrin to get rid of Jesus?
sentences.chinese: 這個神蹟怎樣加速了公會除去耶穌的計劃？

sentences.english: Guild cities will be moved to the same playfield and spot it has been before.
sentences.chinese: 公會城市將遷往同一操場和現貨已經收到。

sentences.english: The pregnancy progresses normally for Karen, an active member of the Panther Creek United Methodist Church in Morristown, Tennessee.
sentences.chinese: 凱倫住在田納西州莫里斯鎮，是衛理公會的虔誠信徒。

sentences.english: The wedding will be at the Episcopal Church.
sentences.chinese: 婚禮儀式將在聖公會教堂舉行的。

sentences.english: So Anglicans follow the Roman Catholic canon a bit more.
sentences.chinese: 所以聖公會更爲遵循羅馬天主教聖經。

definition: (political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)

Greater China/refers to China, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau (esp. in finance and economics)/refers to all areas of Chinese presence (esp. in the cultural field), including parts of Southeast Asia, Europe and the Americas
